name: 2D Shooter Project (Lucas4115)
description:
The modifications I added to my game are

1.Added instructions to the instructions page

2.On level 3 added asteroids that hurt the player and enemies can use as "cover"

3.Added a fourth Level with 2 "Mini Bosses" and a "Big Boss"(also added a level 4 button on the level select screen) and changed the music only for this level 

4.Changed the background of each level 

Created by Lucas Sauter
